title: Fed Blesses PNC Financial’s Plan to Acquire Colorado’s FirstBank
description: The US Federal Reserve gave PNC Financial Services Group Inc. the nod to purchase Colorado-based FirstBank Holding Co.
content: The US Federal Reserve gave PNC Financial Services Group Inc. the nod to purchase Colorado-based FirstBank Holding Co.
